translation.en: Really? That'd be great. Zane's coming, but we can all hang--
translation.ko: 정말? 좋아! 제인도 오는데 같이 놀면…

translation.en: You kids having a fun play date?
Sure.
Sorry about those chips, Zaney. Can't be too careful.
translation.ko: 과자는 미안하구나 조심해서 나쁠 것 없잖니

translation.en: Have a kale cupcake.
Do I have to wear the safety suit all weekend?
Lizards carry disease, honey. Kids and dogs are especially vulnerable.
translation.ko: 도마뱀은 병균을 옮긴단다 아이랑 개한테 특히 위험하지

translation.en: Um, I think my mom wants to pick me up.
-[Zane's mom yells] Thank you, Julie! -They had the best time.
Could you go cut his chicken into non-chokeable pieces?

translation.en: -[music crescendos, ends] -Ow! [thuds]
What? It'll grow back.
You're dressed like a 1950s astronaut and I'm the weird one?
Oh, now you're threatening me, Doodlepoo? Do that--
translation.ko: 날 위협하는 거냐, 두들푸? 어디 한번…

translation.en: -[tense music plays] -What?
-What-- -[Julie] Dinnertime, Eli!
Eli, now! You need three hours to digest your food before bed.
translation.ko: 일라이, 얼른! 잠들기 3시간 전에는 먹어야 소화가 돼

translation.en: This is totally crazy. You talk?
translation.ko: 정말 말도 안 돼! - 말을 하다니? - 너한테만!

translation.en: Just to you.
-'Cause, uh… -I'm special?
Uh, yeah, that's right.
Oh. Okay.
But you can't tell anyone. They'll try to kill me like E.T.
translation.ko: 아무한테도 말하면 안 돼 날 ET처럼 죽이려고 할 거야

translation.en: But my parents told me when someone says, "Don't tell anyone,"
translation.ko: 하지만 부모님께서 누가 '아무한테도 말하면 안 돼' 하면

translation.en: that's when I have to tell.
Well, your parents are right, but that's with strange humans.
translation.ko: 맞는 말씀이긴 한데 그건 낯선 사람일 때 얘기고

translation.en: I'm just a strange lizard. Okay?
-Please don't tell. Especially him. -[Eli] The drone?
translation.ko: - 제발 말하지 마, 특히 쟤한테 - 드론 말이야?

translation.en: No way. You saw what it did to the Cheetos out there.
translation.ko: 절대 안 하지 치토스 어떻게 하는지 봤잖아

translation.en: I mean, it's nice that it's loyal.
Come on. When I was six, kids thought it was cool.
translation.ko: 됐어, 나 6살 때는 애들도 드론 멋지다고 했는데

translation.en: -Maybe you should say something about it. -I don't want to hurt its feelings.
translation.ko: 드론한테 얘기 좀 해봐 드론한테 상처 주긴 싫은데

translation.en: I know a way. I've seen kids break up over the years.
translation.ko: 내가 좋은 방법을 알아 헤어지는 애들을 많이 봤거든

translation.en: You write down why you're dumping them,

translation.ko: 상대한테 화내지 않고 받아들일 시간을 주는 거야

translation.en: It's a "Dear Drone" letter. Get a pen and paper.
translation.ko: 드론에게 이별 편지를 쓰자 펜이랑 종이 가져와

translation.en: [Eli singing] ♪ When you hover over me all day ♪
♪ I feel safe, but also feel My social life melting away ♪
♪ I'm not saying That your caring is a crime ♪
♪ I'd just like to wipe my own butt From time to time ♪
translation.ko: 가끔 뒤처리, 내가 하고 싶을 뿐

translation.en: ♪ And I think that you could Make new friends ♪
♪ Like the 3-D printer in graphic arts ♪
♪ Or the Theragun massager Or the yellow Cuisinart ♪
♪ I'm not saying I don't like you, Mr. Drone ♪
♪ I just want to have the smallest hope Just visible in a microscope ♪
translation.ko: 현미경을 봐야 보이는 그 조그만 희망 갖고 싶을 뿐이야

translation.en: ♪ Of somehow ♪ ♪ Not dying alone ♪
He's just doing it for show. See?

translation.en: He knows he's recyclable.
Let's just give him some space.
Nobody's ever gonna like me like he does.

Smash Mouth? No? Look, it's got a lot of words.

-Uh, get me a caterpillar. -For real?
Trust me.
Oh, that's perfect.
Okay, here we go.
-[slurps] -[laughs] So gross!
Wait.
-[belches] -[Eli] What the--
[Leo] Here, let me show you something.
Eli, where's your safety suit?
Try doing this.
-[giggling] -Very good. [laughs]
[golfer 1] Fore!
-[golfer 2] You nailed that thing. -[golfer 1] What was it? A possum?
[golfer 2] I don't know, but you hit it in the jellybeans.
[golfer 1] Wanna quit and go home? Can't top that.

translation.en: [whispers] Not everyone's invited.
Yes, I'm back.
Where's your tail? You escaping one limb at a time?

translation.en: Just give me some space. I got hit in the jellybeans.

translation.en: I forgot that was there.
Salinas was teacher of the year! That substitute lady's unacceptable.

translation.en: Do the skin cream samples I give out mean nothing to you people?

Dr. Wenger, please. She's sitting right here.
-So? -Jay, it's not polite.
Fine.
May I speak about you as if you're not here?

translation.en: Listen, my kid was on track to get into Westlake next year,

translation.en: Langley Prep in three years, Dartmouth in seven years,

translation.en: then a moderately happy marriage in 14 years.
I paid for that smart board and this light switch.
translation.ko: 제가 스마트 보드랑 전등 스위치 사드렸잖아요

translation.en: If I'm letting you keep this animal as her teacher,
translation.ko: 저 짐승을 우리 애 선생님으로 계속 둬야 한다면

translation.en: you're gonna do something for me to fix this.

Pencils down.
Except Jayda,

Now, one of you has to take home a class pet.

translation.en: Volunteer or be assigned.
I'll take Leo again.
-What is the deal? Leo? Again? -You can't take a pet twice, right?

translation.en: Because I would-- I mean, why do you want him again?
translation.ko: 저도 그때… 아니, 넌 왜 또 데려가?

-Why do you want him? -Uh, same reason. Awesome.
Wait. If it's awesome, I want it.

S-K-I-N. No D's.

translation.en: -[cat screeching] -Jayda, I dyed the cat green.
So unoriginal.
Isn't that great, what I got for you?

Well, Benji, Jayda's substitute teacher is a horror show…

No!

What, Daddy?
♪ Extra time The other kids are sweatin' ♪

translation.en: ♪ All the answers they're forgettin' All except for mine ♪
♪ 'Cause my kid's got extra time… ♪
Should we put the lizard in my room? The birthday party's coming up--

-Oh my God! You talk? -No, it's not safe.

translation.en: -I can only talk to you! -Oh my God! Daddy!
translation.ko: - 세상에! - 너한테만 말할 수 있다고 아빠!

translation.en: ♪ When you roll with Dr. Skin You're a true VIP ♪
♪ 'Cause rules do not apply to me ♪
translation.ko: 난 규칙이 필요 없어 주세요, 추가 시간…

translation.en: -♪ Gimme that extra time… ♪ -You only talk to me 'cause I'm special?
translation.ko: 난 규칙이 필요 없어 주세요, 추가 시간… 내가 특별해서 나한테만 말할 수 있다고?

That makes sense. But can you do tricks at the party?

Just like Emma Lawrence in '03, Nina Myers in '55,

All snotty, all secretly hated.

translation.ko: - 질투한 거야 - 재수 없는 건 질투 안 해

translation.en: and, yeah, only the best people around me.
No, you don't.
Ugh, you don't get what being awesome's like.

Brace yourself.
♪ Not that great ♪
♪ I know you guys are proud But your house is kinda loud ♪
♪ And your dad's a middleweight ♪
♪ Your family's not that great ♪

-♪ He's the face on these flyers ♪ -♪ You live in Fort Myers ♪
translation.ko: - 전단지에 얼굴 나와 - 사는 데도 평범해

translation.en: -♪ Our countertops are quartz ♪ -♪ He gets paid to burn off warts ♪

translation.en: ♪ Mom's like Britney Spears ♪
♪ If you've had six or seven beers I don't mean to denigrate ♪
translation.ko: 너 시력 검사 좀 해봐 깎아내릴 뜻은 없어

translation.en: ♪ We're not that… ♪
Great?

translation.en: We're all just people and lizards.
translation.ko: 우리 모두 그냥 사람이나 도마뱀일 뿐인걸

translation.en: ♪ If you can take a step back ♪
♪ See yourself for what you are ♪
♪ You'll find that You're an even brighter star ♪

There you go.
♪ But I can feel that weight ♪
♪ Coming off like heavy gear ♪

♪ I can finally relate ♪
[both] ♪ It's not bad at all to be ♪

translation.en: ♪ Not that great ♪
-[music crescendos, ends] -[Mrs. Wenger] Bravo.
-Thank you. Great job, guys. -[stopwatch 1] Thanks.
-Honey, maybe you wanna tip them? -What? The watches?

translation.en: -Guys, you want some water? Anybody? -No, that's okay.
translation.ko: - 다들 물 좀 줄까? - 아뇨, 괜찮아요

translation.en: -Okay. Well, thank you. -[stopwatch 2] Yep. Thanks, Mr. Skin.
translation.ko: - 그래, 고마워 - 네 - 감사합니다, 스킨 씨 - 닥터 스킨이야

translation.en: -It's "doctor." "Dr. Skin." -[stopwatch 3] Uh-huh.
Mom, Dad, do we have any more invitations?

-Hi, guys. I'm so glad you came. -Thanks for inviting us.

translation.en: -[laughs] That thing sounded like Cole. -[kids laugh]

translation.en: -[Cole H. laughs sarcastically] -Wow. Zane is funny now?
Zane was always funny.
Like in 2nd grade,

translation.ko: 리모스 선생님한테 슈퍼맨이 '크루통' 행성에서 왔냐고 했잖아?

translation.en: -Hey. You kids try the bubble guy yet? -Dad, we'll get to the bubbles.
translation.ko: - 얘들아, 비눗방울은 받았니? - 아빠, 이따 받을게요

translation.en: This guy's next level. He makes bubble animals.
translation.ko: 저 사람은 차원이 달라 비눗방울로 동물을 만든다니까

translation.en: Here you go. Next. You're not holding it right!
Jayda burgers. Jayda taters.

translation.en: [drone] Jayda vegetables.
[sighs] Please don't do this.
-[chittering] -What're you looking at, boss?
Got a problem with compact legs?
What?
You think you got it so great out there? What do you do in the box?

translation.en: Uh, I molt. Occasional blinking.
All right. I'm sorry, brother. We're fighting the same fight.
I mean, the only fun I've ever had was biting some of that guy's fingers off.

translation.en: I'm just, uh… I'm getting old, you know?
Ever feel like time's running out, and this is all we're ever gonna know?

the truth is, no animal wants to be locked inside--

♪ Follow my simple instruction Wind to the left, sway to the right… ♪
-Okay. Standard magnetic lock. -Circuits are cross-current.
-Jumper cables. Balloon. -Right here.
-[Cole H. yells] This is so fun! -[glass shatters]
[Dr. Wenger] I specifically said "no mayhem!"
-Thanks, PJ. -Uh, TJ.
-Oh, I'm sorry. -It's cool. Jacked about the eye contact.

translation.en: You made it happen, boss. Greatest day ever.

translation.en: -Hey, hey, hey. -[Jayda] Leo! Where's Leo?
-[Summer] Did someone take him? -Please, somebody find him. Leo!
translation.ko: 누가 데려갔나? 누가 좀 찾아줘, 레오!

translation.en: [school kids calling] Leo! Leo! Leo!
-[pops] -You're not holding it right!
-Leo! -[kids celebrate]
Leo!
You guys are really into that lizard.
He's just awesome.

Hey, what is the deal? I've been waiting for your next Jenga move for 30 minutes.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 젠가 네 차례인데 30분째 기다리고 있잖아

translation.en: Now did you make the costume or did your mom?
translation.ko: 의상은 네가 만든 거야? 엄마가 만들어 주신 거야?

translation.en: Tell the truth. You know I won't tell anyone.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말해봐 나 아무한테도 말 안 하잖아

translation.en: -I only talk to you. -[phone ringing]
-What? -[Skyler] Is that another phone?
Uh, I don't know. Uh, must be on Malkin's desk or something.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 맬킨 책상에서 나는 소리인가 봐 "몇 분 뒤에 전화할게"

translation.en: -[Skyler] Hello? -Come on.
-[Skyler] Leo, where'd you go? -[bleeps, chimes]
I… I'll be right there.
-[Skyler] Leo? -[groans]
-[Skyler] Hello? -Hey, pal, toss it here. I'll handle it.
-[phone rings, stops] -[Skyler] Can you hear me?
-[sighs] -[Skyler] Leo? Yeah, I think Malkin must have an extra phone.
translation.ko: - 레오? - 응, 맬킨한테 다른 폰이 있나 봐

translation.en: Anywho, what did Summer say?
Oh my God, you can't all play Jackie Kennedy.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 재키 케네디 역할을 다들 할 수는 없지

translation.en: And, like, we so wanna slay this History Fair.
translation.ko: 그리고 역사 발표회는 정말 성공해야 하잖아

translation.en: [Skyler] I know. That Magic Land Park trip would be awesome.
translation.ko: 그러니까! 매직랜드 파크에 소풍 가면 끝내줄 거야

translation.en: [Leo, feedback-like] Hey, you're awesome because you tried your best.
[Skyler, feedback-like] That's why I'm your special friend?
[Leo chuckles] Yeah.
-[door creaks open] -You talk to Skyler too?
I… I just… Only because she--
That's Summer's phone in there, right behind yours.
translation.ko: 저기 서머 폰도 있잖아 네 폰 바로 뒤에

translation.en: -You happy now? For ruining this? -I don't know what happened.
translation.ko: 이제 만족하냐? 다 망쳐서? 어떻게 된 일인지 모르겠네 내가 엉덩이로 폰을 눌렀나 봐

translation.en: I… I must've butt-dialed ya. I mean, butt-shot ya.
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 일인지 모르겠네 내가 엉덩이로 폰을 눌렀나 봐

translation.en: You don't even have a butt.
[gasps] How dare you?
-You talk to all of us? -You said I was the only one.
translation.ko: 우리 모두랑 얘기한 거야? 나뿐이라고 했잖아

translation.en: You said I was the only one.
-I thought I was special. -You're all special. I--
translation.ko: - 내가 특별한 줄 알았는데 - 너희 모두 특별해, 난…

translation.en: -[Leo] I'm sorry! I just… -[gasps]
Seeing you guys getting along and doing great in class,
translation.ko: 너희가 잘 지내고 열심히 하는 모습을 보면서

translation.en: it felt like I was actually making a difference.
You did. This year would've been a nightmare without you helping me.
translation.ko: 그랬어, 네가 날 안 도와줬으면 올해는 악몽 같았을 거야

translation.en: [Summer] Ms. Malkin's so mean. Talking to you made the class bearable.
translation.ko: 맬킨 선생님은 너무 못됐어 너랑 얘기하는 걸로 버틸 수 있었다고

translation.en: -[Leo] I was just worried if you all knew… -[gasps, breathes heavily]
…other people would find out.
You told me not to tell anyone, and I didn't.
translation.ko: 아무한테도 말하지 말래서 말 안 했어

translation.en: -Nobody did. Because we can keep a secret. -[Logan] Yeah.
translation.ko: 아무도 말 안 했어 - 우린 비밀을 지키니까 - 그래

translation.en: What, did you tell everyone I shave my unibrow?
translation.ko: 왜, 넌 애들한테 내가 일자 눈썹 면도한다고 말했어?

translation.en: Because I don't.
Hey, the only one he told about your unibrow,
or that you still eat your boogers, was me.
translation.ko: 네가 아직 코딱지 먹는다는 얘기 한 건 나뿐이야

translation.en: -And I barely chuckled. -What?
I'm leaving.
I tried.
[Leo] Wait, it's Friday.
Aren't you gonna take me home?
Summer, it's your turn.
Please, I'm so sorry.
How can we trust you now? That was a question.
translation.ko: 이제 우리가 어떻게 널 믿어? 질문이야

translation.en: All right, what's everyone doing here?
Oh, you're leaving. Good. Take the whole day off.
translation.ko: 나가는 길이구나, 좋아! 하루 푹 쉬렴

translation.en: You need to rest up for the history fair tomorrow. Go home.
translation.ko: 내일 역사 발표회를 위해서 쉬어야지, 집에 가라

translation.en: Go. Shoo. Come on, out you go.
You and I have a lot to talk about.
I don't understand.
I… I know I lied to the kids. What did I do to you?
translation.ko: 애들한테 거짓말한 건 맞지만 너한테 뭘 어쨌다고?

translation.en: Excuse me, talking to my students behind my back? Advising them?
translation.ko: 뭐긴, 내 학생들한테 내 험담 한 거? 조언한 거?

translation.en: Okay. I feel terrible, but I was just trying to--
Undermine my methods!
Cheat me out of feeling any satisfaction from their success.
translation.ko: 내가 애들 성취에서 얻을 만족감을 가로챘어

translation.en: What? They learned everything you wanted. Why wouldn't that make you happy?
translation.ko: 애들은 네가 원하는 걸 다 배웠는데 왜 만족을 못 하는 거야?

translation.en: Don't think you can analyze me. I'm an adult.
translation.ko: 날 분석할 수 있다고 생각하지 마 난 성인이야

translation.en: Not a shrieking brat who thinks reading Canterbury Tales is torture.
translation.ko: '캔터베리 이야기' 읽는 걸 고문으로 생각하는 애가 아니라고

translation.en: It's not torture?
Quiet!
Asking me to be happy when I have nothing but these four walls.
translation.ko: 나한테는 이 집밖에 없는데 행복해지라는 거야?

translation.en: -What about your family? -Excuse me, do you see any family?
translation.ko: - 가족은 어쩌고? - 이봐, 가족이 있어 보여?

translation.en: Oh. Uh, not unless you're related to the gym coach.
translation.ko: 기무라 코치랑 무슨 관계가 있으면 모를까

translation.en: -Those pictures are none of your business. -Gotcha. Never saw 'em.
translation.ko: - 저 사진은 네가 알 바 아니야 - 그래, 못 본 걸로

translation.en: I put my whole life into teaching just to be a mere substitute.
translation.ko: 내 평생을 교육에 바쳤는데 임시 담임밖에 못 됐어

translation.en: Never had my own class, never got any respect.
translation.ko: 내 반도 못 가져봤고 아무런 존경도 못 받아봤어 "깜박했네요 임시 담임 맬킨 선생"

translation.en: ♪ Happy? ♪
♪ You want me to be happy? ♪
Look, I also had dreams that never happened.
translation.ko: 저기, 나도 이루지 못한 꿈이 있었어

translation.en: Like seeing the Everglades, or spreading Salmonella.
But this year, I fell into something even better.
translation.ko: 하지만 올해는 훨씬 더 좋은 일에 푹 빠졌지

translation.en: I really clicked with these kids.
Uh, maybe it helped, just a little, that you're a talking animal?
translation.ko: 조금은 도움이 됐겠지? 네가 말하는 동물이란 게?

translation.en: Yeah, but also, maybe it's you.
translation.ko: 그래, 하지만 네 탓도 있을지 몰라

translation.en: 'Cause I've seen subs come through this school that kids love.
translation.ko: 이 학교에는 애들이 좋아하는 임시 담임들도 있었거든

translation.en: ♪ What about Mrs. Knight? ♪
♪ Nice to the kids Didn't smell quite right ♪
♪ Remember Mr. Monk? ♪
♪ He was a closet drunk ♪
♪ This may have been before your time ♪
♪ Miss Losch? ♪
A fine teacher.
♪ She was mine ♪
Wait, you were a student here?
You don't remember me? I was a lot different.
translation.ko: 나 기억 안 나? 그땐 지금이랑 꽤 달랐지

translation.en: I was…
♪ Happy ♪
[Leo] Oh, wow. Yeah.
You were very sweet.
I was adorable. And she…
♪ She made you… ♪
♪ Happy ♪
Yes, she did.
She made me feel like I could do anything.
translation.ko: 내가 뭐든 할 수 있다고 느끼게 해주셨어

translation.en: And tell me, do you think she was…
♪ Happy? ♪
She made you her family.
That's what great teachers do. Even substitutes.
translation.ko: 훌륭한 선생이란 그런 거지 임시 담임이더라도

translation.en: With the little time they have, they try to make a difference.
translation.ko: 주어진 시간이 짧아도 변화를 일으키려고 노력했고

translation.en: And that's what keeps them happy.
♪ You can feel love It's not the end ♪
♪ That smile you had can come back again ♪
♪ Just pull that stick out your tush And take a cue ♪
[song transitions into upbeat] ♪ From teachers that preceded you ♪
♪ You're not alone ♪ ♪ Make a home for them ♪ ♪ And embrace your important role ♪
translation.ko: 넌 가족이 돼줄 수 있어 중요한 역할 맡아봐

translation.en: [both] ♪ In shaping them ♪
♪ Body and soul ♪
-♪ And you'll be ♪ -♪ And I'll be ♪
[both] ♪ Happy ♪
-Well, that felt wonderful. -I know you got it in you.
translation.ko: 이런, 기분 정말 좋았어 너도 할 수 있다는 거 알아

translation.en: You're gonna get those kids first place tomorrow.
translation.ko: 네가 내일 그 애들을 1등 자리에 올려놓을 거야

translation.en: -Oh, you're coming with me. -No, please. They're mad.
translation.ko: 너도 같이 가자 안 돼, 애들 나한테 화났어 우승에 집중하게 해줘

translation.en: Let… Let them focus on winning.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 애들 나한테 화났어 우승에 집중하게 해줘

translation.en: Well, I'm still taking you.
After they win,
we'll make sure they appreciate all you were doing for them.
translation.ko: 우승하고 나면 애들이 꼭 네가 해준 모든 일에 감사하게 하자

translation.en: You know what? You are special.
[Cole H.] I couldn't sleep last night.
I couldn't stop thinking about what Leo did to us.
translation.ko: 레오가 우리한테 한 짓이 자꾸만 떠올라서

translation.en: Let's just not talk about Leo. We're done with Leo.
translation.ko: 레오 얘기는 하지 말자 레오랑은 끝난 거야

translation.en: We're ready. We can win this thing ourselves.
translation.ko: 준비됐어, 우리 힘으로 우승할 수 있어!

translation.en: -[door opens] -Good morning, my dear students.
-They look confident. -You sounded nice. Real warm.
translation.ko: - 자신감 있어 보여 - 따뜻한 말 잘해줬어

translation.en: Thank you. I'll keep you posted when I can.
I'm Betsy Ross.
I designed the first American Flag in 1776.
But I didn't just say what I thought the flag should look like,
translation.ko: 저는 제가 생각하는 깃발의 형태만을 말하지 않고

translation.en: I listened to others to see what they thought.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들 생각을 들으려고 귀를 열었어요

translation.en: The result was the superior design we have today,
translation.ko: 그 결과 현재의 훌륭한 디자인이 탄생했고

translation.en: and also, people liking me more.
I'm Susan B. Anthony.
I played a pivotal role in the women's suffrage movement in the 19th century.
translation.ko: 여성 참정권 운동에서 중추적인 역할을 했지만

translation.en: But I'm not that special or great. And neither is my family.
translation.ko: 저는 그렇게 특별하거나 대단치 않았고 저희 가족도 그래요

translation.en: So I can relate to average women who couldn't vote until 1920.
translation.ko: 그래서 1920년까지 투표권이 없던 일반 여성들과 공감할 수 있었죠

translation.en: I'm Winston Churchill. "We shall fight on the beaches."
"We shall fight them in the fields and in the streets."
"We shall never surrender,
but we shall let them down easy, with a nice letter."
-"So they don't lose their minds." -This is wonderful.
You've taught them life lessons.
I… I can't hear anything. Can you open your pocket?
translation.ko: 아무것도 안 들려 주머니 좀 열어줄래?

translation.en: They burned me, Joan of Arc, at the stake, but I am not afraid.
translation.ko: 그들은 저, 잔 다르크를 화형에 처했지만 저는 두렵지 않습니다

translation.en: Boo-freaking-hoo! Everyone's got problems.
translation.ko: 그까짓 거 후! 누구나 고민은 있거든요

translation.en: I talked about it to a friend and felt a lot better.
translation.ko: 친구에게 고민을 얘기했더니 기분이 훨씬 나아졌어요

translation.en: Aw, I think that friend is you.
[Principal Spahn] Malkin's Marvels, you're going to Magic Land Park!
-Congratulations, class! -[audience applauds and cheers]
[TJ's dad] Yeah!
And to the first substitute to ever win Teacher of the Year!
translation.ko: 그리고 임시 담임 최초로 올해의 교사상을 수상합니다!

translation.en: You'll be chaperoned by Ms. Malkin and Coach Kimura.
translation.ko: 맬킨 선생이랑 기무라 코치가 너희를 인솔할 거란다

translation.en: Is it over? We win? When do I come out?
translation.ko: 끝났어? 우리가 우승했어? 난 언제 나가?

translation.en: [muffled] What's happening?
Ms. Malkin, can we go see Leo?
translation.ko: 맬킨 선생님 저희 레오 보러 가도 돼요?

translation.en: -Honey, it's about to rain. -We can't go to our class for one second?
translation.ko: - 얘, 곧 비가 오겠어 - 잠깐만 교실에 가면 안 돼요?

translation.en: You know what the rain does to my extensions. [sighs]
translation.ko: 비 오면 내 붙임머리 어떻게 되는지 알잖아

translation.en: I gotta say, I thought you were some kind of a twisted animal.
translation.ko: 저는 선생님이 삐뚤어진 짐승인 줄 알았어요

translation.en: A rabid, bitter bag of mothballs foaming at the mouth.
translation.ko: 입에 거품 문 과격하고 모진 좀약 봉지인 줄 알았죠

translation.en: But I've never seen my Jayda speak like that. It's like she's, uh, nice?
translation.ko: 하지만 제이다가 그렇게 말하는 건 처음 봐요 뭐랄까, 착한 아이처럼요

translation.en: That's our Ms. Malkin!
[Kabir's mom] You really got to know our kids.
-What a special lady. -Get this woman a full-time job next year.
translation.ko: 정말 특별한 분이죠! 내년에 정교사로 채용하세요!

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, I think we can arrange that.
[Summer's mom] She's helped Summer make friends.
[Cole H.'s dad] Cole's proud of his voice, thanks to you.
-[Logan's mom] How'd you do it? -Well… You know…
That's, um… my stomach. I… I better go.
-[air horn blares] -She's not gonna make it.
What happened? I couldn't hear nothing.
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거야? 나 하나도 못 들었어

translation.en: Did we win? I thought I was gonna see the kids.
translation.ko: 우리가 우승했어? 애들을 본 거 같은데

translation.en: We're going somewhere very special.
We're all going to celebrate?
What, a pizza party?
Wow, this pizza's out in the boonies.
[grunts] What's goin' on? You're leaving me here?
translation.ko: 무슨 짓이야? 날 여기 버리고 가려고?

translation.en: What about the kids?
They lost. The class embarrassed themselves and blamed you.
translation.ko: 우승 못 했어 다들 부끄러워하고 널 원망했어

translation.en: What? What was all that cheering?
That was for the other class. I'm sorry.
What did I do? I've never felt so bad.
translation.ko: 내가 무슨 짓을 한 거람? 이렇게 속상한 건 처음이야

translation.en: Don't say that. You said the Everglades was your dream.
translation.ko: 그런 말 마, 에버글레이즈가 네 꿈이라고 했잖아

translation.en: Now you can live it out, with no chance of ever running into the children.
translation.ko: 이제 넌 애들이랑 마주치지 않고 살 수 있어

translation.en: Or their parents. Or the principal. Or the media.
I said it was my dream. -The kids are what I-- -[engine revs]
translation.ko: 예전 꿈이었단 말이었지 이제 애들이 내…

translation.en: -[Mia] What? -[Cole H.] Where is he?
-[Summer] Is he hiding? -[Cole H.] He's not hiding.
He was here.
-You seen him? -[Jayda] What happened?
What a shame. He must've run away.
-He left us? -Oh, look.
There seems to be some kind of note.
-Leo could write? -Of course. He could talk.
translation.ko: - 레오가 글도 써요? - 당연하지, 말도 하는데

translation.en: Oh! He talked to you people too? Oh, I thought I was special.
translation.ko: 오, 레오가 너희랑도 얘기했니? 내가 특별한 줄 알았는데!

translation.en: "Dear class." "I've greatly enjoyed my time with you this year,
translation.ko: 'C반에게, 올해 너희와 함께한 시간은 정말 즐거웠지만'

translation.en: but I wish to move on and finally see the world."
translation.ko: '난 계속 나아가서 마침내 세상을 보고 싶어'

translation.en: "I realize I broke your trust, and that can't be fixed."
"But if you would be so kind,
please keep our conversations secret, so that I'm not harassed,
translation.ko: '우리 대화를 비밀로 해줘 그래야 내가 괴롭힘당하지 않아'

translation.en: like E.T. or The Iron Giant, or Splash,
or the classic, The Shape of Water."
"Simply attribute your success to Ms. Malkin,
whose integrity is beyond reproach." [chuckles]
translation.ko: '맬킨 선생의 성실성은 나무랄 데가 없지' "장보기 목록"

translation.en: "Best Regards, Leo."
Well, let's try and be happy for Leo. He's doing what he wanted most.
translation.ko: 레오를 위해 기뻐해 주자 가장 원하던 걸 하고 있으니

translation.en: But we never even got to thank him.
That's life, gang. Life gets more difficult the older we get.
translation.ko: 그게 인생이야 나이가 들수록 더 힘들단다

translation.en: It's called growing up.
♪ When I was ten ♪
♪ I didn't have a single care ♪
♪ And not a single body hair ♪ ♪ And life was fine ♪
♪ When I was nine ♪
♪ We still left milk for Santa Claus ♪
♪ My mom was not in menopause ♪ ♪ And life was great ♪
♪ When I was eight ♪
♪ I still could wear a size one shoe ♪
♪ I thought Big Macs were good for you ♪
♪ Yes, life was heaven ♪
♪ When I was seven ♪
♪ I knew some dirty words But thought ♪
♪ That babies came out of Mom's butt ♪ ♪ Like baby chicks ♪
♪ When I was six ♪
♪ My folks would fight But I was chill ♪
♪ My grandpa and my gerbils Were still alive ♪
♪ When I was five ♪
♪ I didn't care that people die ♪
♪ A haircut used to make me cry way more ♪
translation.ko: 머리 자를 때 더 많이 울었어

translation.en: ♪ When I was four ♪
♪ I didn't need to have a phone ♪
♪ They hadn't yet invented drones To follow me ♪
translation.ko: 드론도 발명 안 된 때라 자유로웠지

translation.en: ♪ When I was three ♪
♪ I'd laugh for days when I was two ♪ ♪ When someone said the word doo-doo ♪
translation.ko: 항상 신났던 2살 때는 응가 소리만 들어도 웃었어

translation.en: ♪ There were no rules when I was one ♪ ♪ Except, don't fall ♪
translation.ko: 규칙 없던 1살 때는 먹고 잘 뿐

translation.en: ♪ We just had fun ♪
♪ But that was then ♪
[all] ♪ When I was ten ♪
Okay, everybody. Be careful on the Dragon Coaster.
